description: Download a tool-specific binary and compose CLI arguments from option mappings.

version.description: Optional version string passed to the download helper.

download.description: Download specification describing platform-specific tool assets.

base.description: Static command arguments (use ${binary} to reference the downloaded binary).

binaryPlaceholder.description: Token within base arguments replaced by the resolved binary path.

options.description: List of option mappings translating settings into CLI flags.

targets.description: Optional target selection rules for appending file or directory arguments.
